Package com.independentid.scim.resource

Class Meta

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.independentid.scim.resource.Value
      • com.independentid.scim.resource.ComplexValue
        • com.independentid.scim.resource.Meta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScimSerializer, java.lang.Comparable<Value>
    public class Meta
extends ComplexValue
implements ScimSerializer
    Meta defines the set of meta attributes for a SCIM resource.

        Returns:

      • setRevisions

        public void setRevisions​(MultiValue revisions)

      • addRevision

        public void addRevision​(RequestCtx ctx,
                        IScimProvider provider,
                        java.util.Date modDate)
                 throws DuplicateTxnException,
                        BackendException
        This method adds a revision record to the resource. The corresponding TransactionRecord is written via a separate process through the EventManager.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx for the transaction that contains the Transaction id
        provider - The IScimProvider that holds the TransactionRecord values.
        modDate - The actual date of the modification/revision
        Throws:
        DuplicateTxnException - When a duplicate transId is found on the current resource or the Transaction Records.
        BackendException - is thrown due to a Backend error.

      • getRevisions

        public MultiValue getRevisions()
